meetings.subject: Intro to iOS Development, Part 1
meetings.description: Learn the basics of iOS Development by building a fun Tap Game!

meetings.subject: Intro to iOS Development, Part 2
meetings.description: Learn more about basics of iOS Development by building a 'Guess the Number' game!

meetings.subject: Intro to UICollectionView
meetings.description: Collection Views are a common component in iOS apps. Learn how to harness them by building a Reminders app.

meetings.subject: Interface Builder and Autolayout
meetings.description: Learn about using Inteface Builder and Autolayout to create apps that look good on every screen size.

meetings.subject: Data Persistence with UserDefaults
meetings.description: Learn how to save your data between launches by building a Pin Drop app (bonus content: MapKit and Gesture Recognizers!).

meetings.subject: Using Multiple View Controllers
meetings.description: Learn how to pass data between multiple View Controllers by building a 'Colors' app. (Bonus content: more UICollectionView!)

meetings.subject: Networking with Codable
meetings.description: Learn how to use URLSession to request data from online APIs, and how to parse the response using Swift's Codable protocol.

meetings.subject: Intro to SwiftUI
meetings.description: Learn the fundamentals of the new SwiftUI framework to build professionally looking cross-platform user interfaces in minutes.

meetings.subject: Intro to Animations
meetings.description: Learn the fundamentals of Animations in Swift by building a gallery app that displays several Transforms and Events!

meetings.subject: Intro to Firebase
meetings.description: Learn how to build a Chat app that uses Firebase's Realtime Database to store data in the cloud.

meetings.subject: App Challenge
meetings.description: See if you can use what you have learned to make a News App!
